item.description:
This is a group of French speakers, active French teachers, and retirees. Nous avons les reunions le premiere vendredi de chaque mois pendant l'année scolaire. There is plenty of room for a large crowd at this one.The building is in the back behind St. Mary Home. Park in visitor space and come to McAuley's auditorium. Free. Refreshments and program provided.

There will be 20-30 people there despite what this site says.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French
